synopsis.text:
Na√Øve and ordinary, Mikoto Shinozaki is a high school student who finds himself entangled in the world of competitive cycling, all in the name of love. Despite his lackluster athletic abilities and the absence of any special talents, Mikoto's life takes a dramatic turn when Yuki Fukazawa, his secret crush and the object of his affections, invites him to join her brother's cycling club.

Initially clueless about cycling and unable to even ride a bike, Mikoto's determination to impress Yuki fuels his desire to learn and improve. As he embarks on this challenging journey, Mikoto discovers a hidden passion for cycling that had been dormant within him for years.

With newfound ambition, Mikoto faces various trials and tribulations alongside his friends and rivals, ultimately aspiring to become the top racer in the prestigious Tour de France. As he pedals his way through the highs and lows of competitive cycling, Mikoto's life transforms in ways he could never have imagined.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
